thread.title: Manchester United target Antoine Griezmann 'will snub Red Devils if they fail to qualify for Champions League'
thread.title_full: Manchester United target Antoine Griezmann 'will snub Red Devils if they fail to qualify for Champions League'

author: James Whaling
title: Manchester United target Antoine Griezmann 'will snub Red Devils if they fail to qualify for Champions League'
text:
Sport Manchester United target Antoine Griezmann 'will snub Red Devils if they fail to qualify for Champions League' Jose Mourinho's side currently sit sixth in the Premier League but are just two points behind fourth-placed Arsenal Share Griezmann could snub a switch to Old Trafford (Photo: AFP) Share Get Manchester United FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Manchester United target Antoine Griezmann is reportedly ready to turn his back on a move to Old Trafford - if the Red Devils fail to qualify for the Champions League. 
Jose Mourinho's side currently sit sixth in the Premier League but are just two points behind fourth-placed Arsenal. 
United are unbeaten in their last 15 games in the top flight after an indifferent start to the season, closing in on the teams above them. 
But Griezmann, who has an £85million release clause, will snub a switch to the Theatre of Dreams if United do not break into the top four, according to The Sun. Griezmann has established himself as one of Europe's top marksmen (Photo: Getty) The Frenchman has been heavily linked with a move to United (Photo: Gonzalo Arroyo Moreno) 
Should the 25-year-old make the move, he will receive the same salary as France team-mate Paul Pogba – £15million a year – and will sign a five-year deal. 
Although United are understood to have agreed personal terms with Griezmann, they have yet to agree a fee with Atletico. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
